ygData.subject: Re: Any local necromancer?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Entreri  If U need a Tank,U could call on me..Currently a Level3 DarkElf Warrior :P ... way that a low level player when
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Entreri <drizzt@...>
If U need a Tank,U could call on me..Currently a Level3 DarkElf Warrior :P

>>Hehe, too bad I'm not near your province. Even though its made in such a
way that a low level player when grouped with a tougher one will earn
extremely little exp, but there is also another way out ;-)

BTW,What type of drinks and food do u guyz usually buy?Cant seem to find the
type where u get when u die during ya first 4 levels.

>>Those types can be bought at certain stores. Those cakes can be found at
the bakers in Qeynos. However, I only eat Muffins and Milk. <<Cheapest and
last just as long as Iron Rations that go for about 1 gold.>> However at
hunting, don't stintch <spello> just buy those Water Flasks and Bread
Loaves. Helps to clear the money weight too.

Wilson aka Yutaka
